content: **from the pattern** andalusia is a solid colored crocheted throw with a modern arrangement of double_crochet and floral motif blocks **skill level** easy **finished size** approximately 41 wide x 58 long including edging **materials** 11 balls berroco comfort 100 grs #9721 sprig also shown in #9744 teal #9730 teaberry #9703 barley and #9737 aster crochet hook size 6 00 mm j or size to obtain gauge tapestry needle **gauge** completed square = 9 1/2 x 9 1/2 make 24 squares assemble as shown in diagram
